english.segment1: Lazy day. Just room enough for me to think and pray about each new day. Draw me from my drowning apathetic state
english.segment2: Stormy day. Just watch the rain melt all my doubt away. Fire away the heated arrows to my lukewarm state
english.segment3: Don't wait. Don't wish away. Today is going to be the day He made. Don't waste. One day is all that we've got to give and take
english.segment4: Bend and break my mind and heart to feel the urgent need. To take all I see and pour my life into eternity. And take it all today and give everything. And take it all today. Lazy day. You're in everything that comes my way.
